long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indulge your sweet tooth and embark on a delicious cookie baking journey in Cookie Clicker, now available as a Chrome Extension! Experience the addictive joy of clicking your way to cookie domination in this popular incremental game.

In Cookie Clicker, your objective is simple yet addictive: click on a giant cookie to earn cookies. Use your earned cookies to purchase upgrades, buildings, and special items that automate the cookie production process. Watch as your cookie empire grows and the cookies pour in.

The game's minimalist design and satisfying "click and collect" gameplay make it easy to pick up and play. As you progress, you'll unlock new upgrades and achievements, unlocking even more cookies and bonuses.

The Chrome Extension edition of Cookie Clicker brings this addictive cookie baking experience directly to your browser. Whether you want to pass the time or challenge yourself to become the ultimate cookie tycoon, Cookie Clicker is just a click away.

Expand your cookie empire by purchasing grandmas, farms, factories, and more. Each building brings its own unique benefits and boosts your cookie production. Strategize and optimize your cookie-making process to unlock even more upgrades and reach new milestones.

Compete against friends or players around the world to see who can bake the most cookies. Compare your progress on the leaderboards and strive to become the top cookie baker in Cookie Clicker.

Install the Cookie Clicker - Chrome Extension now and satisfy your cookie cravings in this addictive and delightful incremental game. Click, upgrade, and watch your cookie empire rise to the top. It's time to unleash your baking skills and become the ultimate cookie master in Cookie Clicker!
